Project Coreward is inspired by the classic PC sandbox adventure, Starflight and is the work of a sole developer. It features approximately 10 hours of story driven gameplay, with a unique plotline and personality.

item.title: Nothing
item.description:
About This Game

The hardest game you're ever going to play. Or is it?

Just do Nothing as the timer goes up. If you do Something, you lose.

If you don't like doing Nothing, go play Something instead.

item.title: I'll Do It Tomorrow
item.description:
About This Game

It's Sara's first day of work.
However, when she takes the elevator to go to the office, she suddenly finds herself on a mysterious floor.
What truth lies behind these weird rooms?
Will you be able to move on? Or rather... will you want to move on?

Features:

  • Play as Sara, a 24-year-old girl.
  • Explore mysterious rooms.
  • Interact with people with familiar faces.
  • Collect key fragments.
  • Find a way to leave this place.

item.title: Sandbox Skyline
item.description:
About This Game

Build impressive skyscrapers pixel-by-pixel, and protect them from the harsh realities of nature. Each pixel is physically simulated to interact with earthquakes, firestorms, blizzards, and tsunamis. Protect your skyline and expand your territory in this relaxing (yet challenging) sandbox builder.

Use magical falling sand to create your city. Craft each pixel with a small brush size, or create large structures quickly with a wide brush. The choice is yours.



Grow food to keep your city fed. If the people get hungry or thirsty, they will start revolt fires!



Deal with forces of nature when mother nature erupts. Be prepared to put out fires and rebuild your structures regularly.




Features

- 2 Distinct Game Modes : Main Quest and Sandbox (just for fun)
- 36 playable levels
- Falling sand physics with dozens of buildable materials
- Cloud Save, Achievements, Customizable settings and controller bindings

item.title: MechAvenger
item.description:
About This Game

MechAvenger is a fast paced VR shooter and platformer about fighting robots after the end of humanity. Shoot, punch, jump and climb your way through the enemy horde, and shut down their factory.



Take down enemies with 9 unique weapons, using your quick reload belt to keep them firing! Bash your enemies with weapons and fists to knock them to the ground.



The robotic horde is plentiful, but ammo is not. Search your environment for extra weapons and ammo. Kill stunned enemies with a melee hit for an ammo bonus!



Navigate platforming sections by climbing and flinging yourself off walls. Swing with the grappling hook to cross long pits and build speed. Get yourself out of harms way with your servo powered dodge.

item.title: MOAR - Appeteaser
item.description:
About This Game

💛 The Appeteser offers endless fun with wave and arena shooters spiced with mini games and an upcoming ingame level builder. Multiplayer is also among future plans.

💛 You will fight a horde of various zombies with different kind of ranged and melee weapons.

💛 You can collect points to unlock new guns, levels and power ups.

💛 It is an easy going fun in which you can jump in any time and enjoy a bit of mayhem.

item.title: Despair: Blood Curse
item.description:
About This Game

A third-person survival horror game featuring non-linear gameplay, puzzles, and enemies from the depths of hell. Soon after the arrival of an unexpected guest back home, Anna's mother suddenly falls ill and passes away. Quickly dismissed by doctors as another casualty of the pandemic, Anna receives a worrying letter from her sister suggesting that not all is as it seems. Will she uncover the truth behind her mother’s death?

Key Features

  • Use Anna's axegun to defeat enemies from a distance or up-close.
  • Non-linear gameplay. Explore and solve puzzles to unlock the mysteries of the mansion and beyond.
  • Limited inventory space. Carefully manage your inventory while always being ready for the unknown.
  • A location-based damage system. Don't waste precious ammo shooting arms and legs. Aim for the head.

item.title: Beer Factory
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2000160/Music_Store_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2394250/Rich_Dad_Simulator/


Beer Factory is a business simulation and management game. Take the challenge and manage your own beer factory, employees, production lines, as well as the import and export of merchandise.

Logistics to manage




Manufacture usually requires a production line, some resources, storage options, and transportation. In Beer Factory, where your goal will be to produce beer, you will need to import and store the raw materials, refine, brew in tanks, store beer, bottle it and finally send it to the client.

Recruit and manage your employees




When you want to develop your business, nothing will work better than hiring staff to help you with your day-to-day tasks. The employees in your factory can handle most jobs, but it is up to you to tell them what to do. Don't forget to monitor their progress!

A realistic economy




Every action has a cost and it's up to you to manage your finances. From recruitment to transportation to taxes, the whole finance system in Beer Factory has been designed to be as close to reality as possible.

Customize and upgrade your factory




In order to make beer, you need all kinds of machines. Once you have invested in new machinery, you will be able to exploit it, improve it, and use its maximum potential to produce even more! Then you can expand your factory to grow your business into an empire!

item.title: Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens
item.description:
About This Game

"Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens" is an exciting puzzle computer game that will immerse you in a world of cute and fluffy cats capable of amazing transformation! In this game you will become a master at mixing colorful kitties and solving fascinating puzzles.

The main feature of the game is unique and diverse cats, each of which has its own color and character. Starting levels will introduce you to the basics of the game: swipe the cats in different directions so that they mix with each other and create a new cat with a new shade. But be careful, not all cats want to mix with each other, and some combinations may not work out the way you expect! As you progress through the levels, the complexity of the puzzles and the number of cats will increase.

You will find colorful graphics, gentle background music and an incredibly cute atmosphere!

    Main features:

  • Cute atmosphere and visual style - the main feature of the game is its charming and cozy atmosphere. The graphics are made in bright and saturated colors that fill the game with joy and warmth. Each cat has a unique design, and the design of the game is filled with comfort and cute details. Soft music will create a calm and relaxing atmosphere.
  • Different cats - the game features a variety of colorful cats, from classic black and white to bright orange, green and blue. Each cat interacts with each other in different ways, so not all can be mixed with each other. All cats are united by their unique and cute design.
  • Exciting puzzles - the game has 150 levels with different difficulty, where you have to prove your skills in mixing and puzzles. You will need to combine cats of different colors in the color combinations you need to complete the level. With each level, the difficulty will increase, and you will need more logical thinking and creativity to solve the problem.
  • Simple interface - the game is designed with the convenience of the players in mind, and it is easy to master even for beginners.
  • Collectible achievements - the game rewards you for your creativity and effort. For successfully mixing cats and completing difficult levels, you will receive achievements and new cats for further experimentation.

"Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens" is the perfect game for those who love puzzle games, cute cats and cozy atmosphere. It is designed to give you a lot of joy, fun and creativity, wrapped in cute and fluffy creatures.

item.title: Trash Top Down Racing
item.description:
About This Game

Story:

Race against 3 other AI racers in 10 different racing tracks in this 2d top down racing games. All races are 3 laps long in different areas. Also game contains result list. So be the fastest driver and beat ai opponents

Features:

- 10 tracks
- Steam Achievements
- 3 AI opponents

item.title: Get Out Joey !
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2384890/Get_Out_Joey

Help arrogant Joey rise to the surface. In a unique, gigantic maze-like world, you'll have to use your concentration and skill to avoid losing out to the dangers.

Joey's graceful movements

  • Of course you can jump! Jumping is an essential part of the gameplay. Short jumps, long jumps, millimetric jumps, always. Watch out for the fall!
  • Hey ho, you can rush too! Jump too short? Platform too far? Go for it! But watch out for the fall!
  • Swing! With your spear, you'll be able to hold on to certain parts of the scenery and swing to progress through your adventure. This technique is often essential for crossing huge chasms. But, once again: BEWARE OF FALLS!

What Joey doesn't know, but you do, now

  • The world is spinning. Regularly, gravity will knock you off your feet. The closer you get to the top, the harder the fall.
  • You can activate checkpoints. Just so you don't rage too often. That would be a shame.
  • There's also a drop counter to depress you and compare you to your buddies.



    Joey's final word:
    "- I'm great, I've got a big bag and a magic spear.
    But I'm stuck here, and I've got to get out. Hurry!"

    (Joey is arrogant)

item.title: Buriedbornes2 - Dungeon RPG -
item.description:
About This Game

Easy to play ✕ Severe adventure again

.

Buriedbornes2 is the sequel to the easy-to-play turn-based dungeon RPG series.
The popular series, which has surpassed 2.5M total users, has evolved in a form that is easier to play and more freely enjoyable.
Choose between 2 options for the room you want to progress in, decide which items you want to obtain, choose from up to 5 skills to use next, and more...
The simple, non-real-time operation allows you to enjoy a serious adventure where death is the only thing you have to worry about.

The battle of the dead and the cooperative "Union"

.

The world is on the brink of ruin due to the invasion of the "Ancient Overlord" and his army of corpses, a threat suggested by the most ancient prophecies.
You will repeatedly challenge dangerous dungeons by acquiring corpses, altering them, and using the forbidden "Buriedbornes" art of possessing their souls.
It is a hopeless battle with no redemption or end, yet mankind has not given up on everything yet.
In various parts of the world, communities of survivors, each with their own goals, continue to resist.
By helping each other with them, we may find hope.

Races, jobs, origins, equipments, skills, runes... countless combinations

.

At the start of the adventure, character creation is possible by selecting the race, job, and origin of the corpse to be used.
Each legendary equipments that can be found in each dungeon has its own unique abilities.
Up to 5 skills can be held, each of which can be set with up to 5 skill runes that can also be obtained in dungeons.
These elements allow you to build your tactics freely from a myriad of options.
You can build your builds systematically, or you can improvise and discover powerful builds through unexpected coincidences.

item.title: ISOLAND4: The Anchor of Memory
item.description:
About This Game

"ISOLAND4: The Anchor of Memory" belongs to which part of the ISOLAND series? Does it continue the story from "ISOLAND3: The Dust of the Universe," or does it start a new chapter? Can it truly unravel the past and present of the Lost Island?

You'll only know after you've played it yourself. Wait a moment... even after playing, you might not necessarily know. :)

Since the first ISOLAND, this journey has been full of twists and turns, both in the game and in real life.

ISOLAND4 continues to pay homage to literature, art, and music like its predecessors, with more intricate maps and puzzles. However, the foundation lies in richer Easter eggs, more mystical dialogues, and more abundant emotions.

This installment emphasizes the characters in the story, featuring both familiar and new faces. They assist you in rediscovering the island's secrets while unraveling their own life mysteries.

Do not overlook any detail; do not miss any conversation.

Things that seem useless may offer players more contemplation on the fate of life.

This ISOLAND is dedicated to my mother.

item.title: DOLL EYE: CHAPTER ONE
item.description:
About This Game

DOLL EYE: CHAPTER ONE is the first part of a dialogue-based, story-driven psychological horror game made in RPG Maker MZ.

"Where did this all start?"

Tomorrow is the anniversary of your son's death, but you can't let that distract you from your everyday life.
Your daughter has just sent you a message asking you to pick her up near that one shark dude's bar. Worry not - your guardian angel can keep you company... Wait, who the hell is that?

"I think..."

This game features original art/music and is about one hour long. This might depend on your reading speed, how many things you check, your choices, etc.
This game has one ending.

"...I think I realize it, now."

item.title: Dragon Lair Depths
item.description:
About This Game

Build and upgrade your own hero team. On the 9x9 board, use limited action points in each round, manipulate heroes with different abilities, play coordination, guard earth vein, and destroy enemies.

Game highlights:

1. Racial heroes of various elemental powers:
  • Nagas: Control the use of flames to ignite the enemy.
  • Elf: Powerful recovery, and generate spirit grass traps to control enemies
  • Water: can summon the water grid that reduces the enemy's movement
  • Rock: use rocks to control the enemy's progress, and fight cattle across mountains
  • Thunderclan: Summons thunderclouds that deal damage every turn
  • Stay tuned

2. Unexpected reactions between elements/terrains:
  • Ignite the grass, all connected grass will catch fire
  • Grasslands affected by lightning will also catch fire
  • Water grid can conduct electricity

3. High difficulty strategy battle:
  • Victory: Destroy all enemies
  • Failure: All our heroes are dead, or all earth vein are destroyed
  • Enemy Intention: Each enemy will display the behavior intention of the next round, and the enemy will only perform one behavior in each round of movement/attack/skill
  • Action Points: Action Points shared by all our heroes, reset and refreshed every round
  • Going into battle/Going out of battle: Heroes can spend action points to go out of battle to avoid damage, and go into battle to any grid in our area

4. Mild rogue experience:
  • Replay value: every round is a new experience, no outside development
  • Random events: several random events
  • build: Dozens of relics with different abilities can be obtained, equipped with heroes to produce various chemical reactions
  • Permanent death: When a hero dies, a point of HP will be deducted from the upper limit. If the upper limit is 0, the hero will die permanently

item.title: Borderwatch: Dark Armada
item.description:
About This Game

Borderwatch is a 3rd person co-op zombie survival game. The world is invaded by infected creatures. As
a result of this invasion, the union of nations has decided to leave the world. After the decision to leave
Earth, a final call has been made for the survivors. Helicopters will take off from all capitals in the world
every 10 days. The people who catch up with this helicopter will survive.

Build your team, Loot and Survive!

The world has been under the influence of infected creatures. The United Nations has recognized that the world has become unlivable. To catch the last call, it is necessary to go to the nearest capital and get on the escape helicopter. It is a very tough fight against this infected virus that is getting stronger day by day.

Attention!

Infected creatures carry the characteristics of the regions they are in. The United Nations has so far performed autopsies on 2 infected creatures. As a result of the autopsy, it was determined that one of the infected creatures was pregnant and could reproduce. As a result of research on the creature that was born, it was determined that it was much stronger than its previous generation.

Build Your Team

Team of 4 with surrounding survivors.
Organize, act strategically and be the one to increase your chances of survival in the apocalypse.

Loot

The only way to get rid of the infected creatures is to get on the helicopter 10 days later. In the process, use everything you find around to stay alive. Weapons, ammo, traps, medical equipment, food and water. Volunteer pilots regularly deliver supplies to the area, showing them a sign of survival.

Listen to Other Survivors.

Listen to radio signals from other survivors for information on the area and cooperate with them to stop the epidemic. The United Nations stated that time is running out for survivors.
Note:
It's the only device in the area that provides the generator radio link. Make sure the generator is running. Caution, it's unclear where the radio signals are coming from. Try to survive by making the right decisions.

Survive

Use limited consumables carefully, count your ammo, and be fast to survive the zombie raids that are getting harder every day!

Features

  • Realistic post-apocalyptic graphics
  • Strategy based 3rd person gameplay
  • Co-op Multiplayer for up to 4 players
  • immersive game
  • Game mechanics improvement.
  • 3 maps: İstanbul, Abu Dhabi, Moscow and more capitals

item.title: Martha's Dolls
item.description:
About This Game



Martha's Dolls is a first-person horror game where you play as a player who has ventured into an abandoned village rumored to be cursed by the haunted dolls of an old woman named Martha. The village is full of these dolls, and those who enter the village are never able to leave.

Your goal is to investigate the village and uncover the secrets behind Martha's dolls and the curse that plagues the village. However, you must be careful, as the dolls are not to be underestimated. They are said to be possessed by Martha's vengeful spirit, and they will stop at nothing to protect their village and its secrets.

As you explore the village, you will encounter a variety of different dolls, each with its own unique abilities and behaviors. Some dolls will simply wander the village, while others will actively hunt you down. You will need to use your wits and survival skills to avoid the dolls and stay alive.

In addition to the dolls, you will also need to be wary of the village itself. The village is full of traps and hazards, and it is easy to get lost in its maze-like streets. You will need to carefully navigate the village and avoid the traps in order to find your way out.

Martha's Dolls is a challenging and suspenseful horror game that will test your nerves. If you are looking for a truly terrifying experience, then Martha's Dolls is the game for you.



Here are some of the features of Martha's Dolls:

- Variety of different dolls, each with its own unique abilities and behaviors.
- Challenging and suspenseful horror experience.
- Maze-like village full of traps and hazards.
- Dark and atmospheric world to explore.
- Gripping story to uncover.
- Realistic Horror Experience !
- All what you need ( Inventory System , Player Items , Puzzles ...)


If you are a fan of horror games, then Martha's Dolls is a must-play. It is a truly terrifying and unforgettable experience.

item.title: Last Dino Standing
item.description:
About This Game

Last Dino Standing is a hand-drawn 2D casual game where your goal is just to stay alive avoiding the crazy elements that fall from the sky. You're the last Tyrannosaurus alive in the dinosaur extinction event. We already know how this story ends, but you need to survive as long as you can.

Main features:

  • Funny visuals.
  • Simple accurate movements.
  • 4 difficulty levels to choose from.
  • Timer system.
  • Map variations.

and more secrets to discover.

item.title: Evil Seal
item.description:
About This Game

Evil Seal is an action horror game inspired by the Apocalypse of St. John.



The story begins when the first of the Seven Seals is broken and the first of the Four Knights begin to spread confusion and destruction on Earth.
The new Messiah, the devil's son, manages to create a new religious cult by performing initial miracles, with many followers. The "miracle-people" discover the price they have to pay soon: a few months after the miracle, their bodies are emptied of all traces of humanity. The new religious order followers will be transformed into beings with no rationality or control, hungry for human flesh and incapable of feeling.



Adam is a man deeply in love with his sweet half, Eve. But fate is cruel: when the first seal of the apocalypse is broken, Eve is kidnapped by dark forces.

Thus, with a broken heart and an incredible determination, Adam embarks on a desperate journey to find the love of his life. Along the way, he will face epic challenges and unveil dark secrets, battling evil creatures and overcoming insurmountable obstacles.



A real estate agent, with a past in the marines, helps Adam to find Eve in a city devastated by demons and infernal creatures.
And the story continues...
What will happen when the other seals are broken?



This game is the first of a trilogy that provides for the breaking of the 7 seals of the apocalypse.



Raffaele Mandese created this video game entirely on his own, covering all aspects from graphics, gameplay, sounds, to the story. The team Mandese Games is the name of the team he formed, but currently, it only has him as a member.

item.title: Elemental Engagements
item.description:
About This Game


Wield god powers and command legions of elemental thralls against your friends! Elemental Engagements is a split screen, versus, real-time-strategy game. Gain favor with the elemental gods to use their 16 powers, battle on 3 maps, and play with either Keyboard or Controller!

Elemental God Powers

As a major wind god, you'll wield wind powers. However, winning the favor of the other gods will grant you fire, water, and earth god powers.
Use wind to control the battlefield! Use fire to damage your opponent! Use water to support your units! Use earth to deny enemy movement!

Sacrifice and Gain Favor

As a match progresses, you can choose which elements you will sacrifice your thralls to. The more territory you capture, the more favor and god powers you will gain for the associated elements, but you can only have a limited amount! This means that no game will play the same and each player must choose their sacrifices wisely.

Pick Up & Play

Elemental Engagements is a progressively-faster paced game on match by match basis. This means that most matches will last 5-20 minutes. The controls are designed specifically for the gamepad and split-screen gameplay, so RTS veterans and casual players alike will find tons of fun and room to strategize!

item.title: RC Revolution: High Voltage - 免费玩
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into RC Revolution High Voltage, the exhilarating free version of RC Revolution

Select from three dynamic cars, unlock a fourth, and challenge our AI for a fifth. Customize for style and performance, and get ready for stunt-filled tracks and nitro-fueled speed craze. Your high-nitro adventure awaits!

Experience the Thrill of RC Revolution High Voltage

Discover RC Revolution High Voltage – the ultimate free RC racing adventure! Choose your car, master stunts, and unleash nitro speeds. This game blends strategy with exhilarating action, offering a unique, timeless racing experience. Dive into a world of speed, skill, and style!

Exhilarating Stunts and Individual Triumphs

Master extreme jumps, twists, and flips in this solo racing adventure. Customize for peak performance, conquer challenging tracks, and elevate your racing prowess. Every race is a chance to defy gravity and make your mark!

Exclusive Cars, Diverse Tracks, and Personalized Customization

Start with three specialized cars and unlock two more as you progress. Each track offers unique challenges to test your skills. Customize your select vehicles to match your racing style and see the impact on your track performance.

item.title: The Summit Library
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome, Keeper.



...To the wonders of the Summit Library; the largest and most important Library in the Eawin Empire. Your trade has been suffering under the rule of the current Emperor -- but with the Summit requesting your services things are looking up.

Except when you arrive you suddenly find yourself in a dangerous magical mystery. Something's wrong with the books, and the Library is falling apart at the seams.

Also, there might be a war? But the Summit Library is situated on neutral territory, so that doesn't affect you.

...Right?

As you set out the uncover the Library's secrets, you get drawn into the complexities of the Empire's politics; rebellion, betrayal, underground organisations, and more. Meet the various people residing at the Summit Library; make alliances and enemies; fall in love and get your heart broken.

Make choices that matter and explore all the multiple routes and endings, as well as the secrets you can record in your Codex.

May you live to see the end of this tale written.

*

Meet the Residents



Berit - the High Librarian
Overworked and underappreciated, Berit is slowly being crushed by the expectations put on her shoulders.



Aias - the Cynical Investigator
Standoffish and unfriendly, Aias doesn't seem to have much taste for his work, using his position as Librarian to discover hidden truths instead.



River - the Shrewd Politician
Calculating, charming, and a little too interested in the secrets of your trade, River's true intentions remain a mystery.



Yakyar - the Rebel Survivor
Escaping a bloody fate, Yakyar wields magic of their own -- and seems to know far more about yours than possible.



Thasar - the Runaway Soldier
Weary of killing and made bitter by the blood on his hands, all Thasar wants is to turn his back on the world.

*

Features

  • A magical mystery set in a fantasy-rich world
  • Choices that matter; have your actions and relationships with others shape the story
  • A customisable MC; choose your name, appearance, pronouns, and place of origin
  • A diverse LGBTQ+ cast
  • Collectible CGs
  • Unlockable information for your codex
  • Optional mature intimacy scenes

Content warnings:
Fantasy violence, death, blood, strong language, screenshakes, sexual themes and language.

This game will feature mature content and mature intimacy scenes in the future, and is intended for 18+ audiences. These scenes can always be skipped without penalty and are completely optional for gameplay.

Currently Chapter 1 is out and free to play! Check back soon for the next installment.

item.title: My Lovey-Dovey Demon
item.description:
About This Game



Taiki is your average guy. He’s nineteen years old, in his first year of university, and he’s just starting to learn what it means to be an adult.

During the summer vacation, Taiki goes to the countryside to stay with his grandparents alongside his siblings: the haughty, fashionable Chiharu; the tomboyish troublemaker Nene; and the sweet, shy Reza.

Taiki wants to have a relaxing summer, but his hopes are dashed when Nene breaks into their grandfather’s study, which is strictly out of bounds. Inside his study, Nene finds a treasure trove of dusty old books, including a tome full of instructions on how to summon demons.

Nene sets about this demonic summoning ritual at once, and calls upon a fearsome figure from the deepest, darkest depths of Hell…

Who just so happens to be a cute girl with pink hair and an impressive bust?!

Now Taiki’s in a real pinch. Not only does he have to look after his siblings, but he also has his demonic guest, Elisabeth, to worry about – and she’s completely besotted with him! What in the world is Taiki going to do now?!



  • 80k of text (approx 4-6 hours of reading)
  • A kinetic story with no choices or branches
  • Detailed character artwork
  • A lot of pretty backgrounds of the Japanese countryside
  • A soothing OST
  • A very cute demon girl
  • A light, sweet, fluffy romance story!

item.title: Mystic Strife
item.description:
About This Game



Mystic Strife is a fast-paced chaotic party fighting game for up to eight friends. Choose one of six characters with unique abilities and prepare yourself for a simple yet surprisingly deep platforming deathmatch!

Characters:

  • Ranger: Equipped with a bow and three recoverable arrows.
  • Wizard: Slings a torrent of fireballs and can cast a powerful long-range magic beam.
  • Necromancer: Raises the dead to muster a legion of skeletons that persist through rounds.
  • Rogue: Eqipped with a hookshot to quickly manuever around the stage and to pull in her foes.
  • Engineer: Equiped with a reloadable musket and can build repairable turrets.
  • Dragoon: Weilding a lance, she can take to the skies with a mighty leap and come crashing down with a powerful shockwave.

Key Features:

  • Tight platforming controls that are simple to learn, hard to master.
  • Deflect physical projectiles back at your opponents with a well-timed strike.
  • Pick up various powerups like shields, speed boosts and more.
  • Six unique characters.
  • Nine playable stages.

PLEASE NOTE: This game has no single-player content. It must be played with your buddies IRL or through Steam Remote Play. (Buddies not included)

item.title: Tick, Tank, Boom
item.description:
About This Game

Tick, Tank, Boom is an arcade multiplayer-shooter where players fight each other in various game modes like free for all, domination or capture the flag. A large selection of tanks will give you everything you need to find your perfect playstyle to succeed on the battlefield.




In Tick, Tank, Boom you battle other players from around the world online, or host a LAN party with your friends - the choice is yours! With a large selection of game modes and custom rule settings, you can have exactly the experience you want.

item.title: Hertz
item.description:
About This Game



Launch into a relentless roguelike action experience in this top-down shooter with bombs!

In a robotic world, control Lizzy and their band of unlockable beasty bots, each hungry for upgrades to enhance their abilities. However, the precious resources required are guarded by Steel Sentinels, guardians of the arena. Your mission is to outmaneuver these sentinels, collect valuable upgrades, and create powerful, game-changing synergies. Will you outsmart these mechanical wardens and survive the treacherous arena to build the ultimate beasty bot?

FEATURES

  • Many weapons: bombs, mines, missiles, and special bullet ammunition types like metal, poison, fire, and ice.
  • Resource gathering: Destroy enemies and breakable blocks to get resources necessary to upgrade your animal bot.
  • Customizable Upgrades: Combine over 60+ unique upgrades for powerful and diverse gameplay strategies.
  • Varied Encounters: Experience diverse gameplay with randomized enemy types, spawn points, and resource distribution within levels, creating unique encounters each playthrough.

LIZZY BOT

BAMBI BOT (unlockable)

FOXY BOT (unlockable)

RABBY BOT (unlockable)
